code: import{getCurrentTime}from"../time/addHours";import{getDegreeDay,getDegreeHour}from"./getDegree";import{getStatusHour}from"./getStatus";import{getTimeDaily,getTimeHourly}from"./getTime";import{WeatherStatus}from"../GetWeatherType";export function getHourPreviews(hourly){var date=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:getCurrentTime(0);var previewData=[];var currentTimeRounded=date.substring(0,13)+":00";var hours=parseInt(currentTimeRounded.substring(11,13));var maxIterations=23-hours;for(var i=0;i<=maxIterations;i++){var temperatureIndex=hourly.time.indexOf(currentTimeRounded)+i;var degree=getDegreeHour(hourly.temperature_2m,temperatureIndex);var status=getStatusHour(hourly.weathercode,temperatureIndex);var time=getTimeHourly(date,i-2);var weatherData={degree:degree,status:status,time:time};var clicked=false;previewData.push({weatherData:weatherData,clicked:clicked});}return previewData;}export function getDayPreviews(daily){var clickedIndex=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:-1;var previewData=[];var date=new Date(getCurrentTime(0));var currentTimeRounded=date.toISOString().substring(0,14)+":00";for(var i=1;i<=7;i++){var temperatureIndex=daily.time.indexOf(currentTimeRounded)+i;var degree=getDegreeDay(daily.temperature_2m_min,daily.temperature_2m_max,temperatureIndex);var status=WeatherStatus.NONE;var time=getTimeDaily(i-1);var weatherData={degree:degree,status:status,time:time};var clicked=i-1===clickedIndex;previewData.push({weatherData:weatherData,clicked:clicked});}return previewData;}
